biography.value:
When an archduke of the Nine Hells needs a creature tracked, found, and either done away with or captured, the task usually falls to an orthon. These devils are infernal bounty hunters, tireless in their pursuit of their quarry across the multiverse.

Orthons are infamous for their sharp senses. Because an orthon can become invisible at will, its quarry is often unaware of being hunted until the orthon strikes. This invisibility can be disrupted when the devil is attacked, however, so a strong counterattack is often the best defense against it.

Orthons value the challenge of the chase and the thrill of one-on-one combat above all else. An orthon’s first loyalty is to its archduke, but one with no immediate assignment might work for anyone who promises it a worthy struggle against a lethal foe. Because they travel widely, orthons are unequaled as guides through the layers of the Nine Hells.

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse
Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value: Half plate consists of shaped metal plates that cover most of the wearer's body. It does not include leg protection beyond simple greaves that are attached with leather straps.

Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d4 + @mod type=force average=true]] damage, and the target must make a [[/save con 17 format=long]], taking [[/damage 4d10 type=poison average=true]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On a failure, the target is also &Reference[poisoned]{poisoned} for 1 minute. The &Reference[poisoned]{poisoned} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d10 + @mod type=force average=true]] damage. The target also suffers one of the following effects of the orthon’s choice; the orthon can’t use the same effect two rounds in a row:

&Reference[acid]{Acid}. The target must make a [[/save con 17 format=long]], taking [[/damage 5d6 type=acid average=true]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Blindness. The target takes [[/damage 1d10 type=radiant average=true]] damage. In addition, the target and each creature within 20 feet of it must succeed on a [[/save dex 17 format=long]] or be &Reference[blinded]{blinded} until the end of the orthon’s next turn.

Concussion. The target and each creature within 20 feet of it must make a [[/save con 17 format=long]], taking [[/damage 2d12 type=thunder average=true]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Entanglement. The target must succeed on a [[/save dex 17 format=long]] or be &Reference[restrained]{restrained} for 1 hour by strands of sticky webbing. The target can escape by taking an action to make a DC 17 &Reference[str]{Strength} or &Reference[dex]{Dexterity} check and succeeding.

Paralysis. The target takes [[/damage 4d10 type=lightning average=true]] damage and must succeed on a [[/save con 17 format=long]] or be &Reference[paralyzed]{paralyzed} for 1 minute. The &Reference[paralyzed]{paralyzed} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Tracking. For the next 24 hours, the orthon knows the direction and distance to the target, as long as it’s on the same plane of existence. If the target is on a different plane, the orthon knows which one, but not the exact location there.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
Magic Resistance. The orthon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
In response to dropping to 15 hit points or fewer, the orthon explodes. All other creatures within 30 feet of it must each make a [[/save dex 17 format=long]], taking [[/damage 2d8 type=fire average=true]] damage plus [[/damage 2d8 type=thunder average=true]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The orthon, its infernal dagger, and its brass crossbow are destroyed.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
The orthon becomes &Reference[invisible]{invisible}. Any equipment it wears or carries is also &Reference[invisible]{invisible} as long as the equipment is on its person. This invisibility ends immediately after it makes an attack roll or is hit by an attack roll.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse
